noticia-1-titol: Opening of a New Resort in Bali
noticia-1-descripcio: This month, we are opening our new resort in Bali, with spectacular ocean views and exclusive activities for guests.
noticia-2-descripcio: Enjoy a romantic package at any of our locations with exclusive discounts for couples until the end of the month.
noticia-3-descripcio: We have renovated our rooms and common areas to ensure maximum comfort and luxury during your stay.
noticia-4-descripcio: We are proud to announce our certification as an eco-friendly hotel, with sustainable practices in all our operations.
noticia-5-descripcio: We are excited to announce the opening of our new hotel in Paris, located in the heart of the city.
noticia-6-descripcio: Join us for an exclusive gastronomy event with world-renowned chefs.
ofertas-subtitulo: Book now and save up to 30%
valors-historia-descripcio: Since the beginning, we have been committed to redefining hospitality, combining elegance, comfort, and attention to detail. With a presence in various destinations, we continue creating unforgettable experiences that serve as a refuge for today’s travelers.
valors-sostenibilitat: Sustainability: We reduce waste, promote energy efficiency, and collaborate with local initiatives.
valors-atencio-client: Customer Service: Personalized and attentive service, with attention to details that make a difference.
valors-compromis-comunitat: Commitment to the Community: We integrate local culture and support the development of local businesses and communities.
valors-filosofia-descripcio: A hotel chain with the goal of redefining hospitality, combining elegance, warmth, and impeccable service to offer unique experiences in various destinations.
